title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: f''(x) = 0 or f(x) = 0

1 point is earned for the equation in one variable

1 point is earned for the answer

At this inflection point, f''(x) = 0 and f(x) = 0.

f'( x )=0⇒ −k 4 x 3/2 + 1 x 2 =0⇒k= 4 x f( x )=0⇒k x −lnx=0⇒k= lnx x Therefore, 4 x = lnx x ⇒4=lnx ⇒x= e 4 ⇒k= 4 e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWGMb Gaai4jamaabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabg2da9iaaicda cqGHshI3daWcaaqaaiabgkHiTiaadUgaaeaacaaI0aGaamiEamaaCa aaleqabaGaaG4maiaac+cacaaIYaaaaaaakiabgUcaRmaalaaabaGa aGymaaqaaiaadIhadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaaaaOGaeyypa0JaaG imaiabgkDiElaadUgacqGH9aqpdaWcaaqaaiaaisdaaeaadaGcaaqa aiaadIhaaSqabaaaaaGcbaGaamOzamaabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkai aawMcaaiabg2da9iaaicdacqGHshI3caWGRbWaaOaaaeaacaWG4baa leqaaOGaeyOeI0IaciiBaiaac6gacaWG4bGaeyypa0JaaGimaiabgk DiElaadUgacqGH9aqpdaWcaaqaaiGacYgacaGGUbGaamiEaaqaamaa kaaabaGaamiEaaWcbeaaaaaakeaacaWGubGaamiAaiaadwgacaWGYb GaamyzaiaadAgacaWGVbGaamOCaiaadwgacaGGSaWaaSaaaeaacaaI 0aaabaWaaOaaaeaacaWG4baaleqaaaaakiabg2da9maalaaabaGaci iBaiaac6gacaWG4baabaWaaOaaaeaacaWG4baaleqaaaaaaOqaaiab gkDiElaaisdacqGH9aqpciGGSbGaaiOBaiaadIhaaeaacqGHshI3ca WG4bGaeyypa0JaamyzamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGinaaaaaOqaaiabgkDi ElaadUgacqGH9aqpdaWcaaqaaiaaisdaaeaacaWGLbWaaWbaaSqabe aacaaIYaaaaaaaaaaa@8BB8@
